column3: Quick glance utACK. Nice fix. IMO it's more readable this way anyway, since it makes it more obvious to the casual reader that signals/slots are just sugary macros and not some c++ functionality they're not aware of.\n
Fixed some unmeant changes of emit in sentences to Q_EMIT in comments (but left the ones where it makes sense)\n
Should be fairly risk-free to do in older major releases as well in case we want to backport #6421\n
